message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I know you'll find valuable.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value it will bring to your work. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  While I see the value in the product, $10,000 is still a bit high for my budget.  Could you do $9,500?
